column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Delicious ramen! This was my first time here
column2: and I was not disappointed. I ordered the Spicy Chicken Ramen. I chose the spicy spice level. I can handle a lot of spice
column3: and the spicy was not very spicy. I recommend ordering another round of noodles when you finish because they don't give you very many to begin with. The service is great. The atmosphere is nice
column4: but this place is very dimly lit. It would be nice if they brightened it up a bit.
